citations.narrative:
The licensee moved to a new address and did not notify Animal Care of his change of address. The licensee is currently
operating his kennel from an unapproved site. Conducting regulated activity from an unapproved site does not allow
APHIS Officials to know the location of the animals and does ensure optimal animal welfare and well-being. The licensee
shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change of address. Correct by:
October 13, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
2.1(b)(1) 
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee moved to a new address and did not notify Animal Care of  his change of address.  The licensee is currently 
operating his kennel from an unapproved site. Conducting regulated  activity from an unapproved site does not allow 
APHIS Officials to know the location of the animals and does ensure optimal animal welfare and well-being.  The licensee 
shall notify Animal Care no fewer than 90 days and obtain a new license before any change of address.  Correct by:  
October 13, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
